long_description: The Rossingol Rookie kids' snowboard bindings transform today's groms into future shredders. You don't have to be big to go big! NHC fiberglass-reinforced nylon baseplates allow young riders to easily flex bindings, offering better board control while still providing support. Free Back highbacks are lighter weight than their adult counterparts yet offer great support and integrated heel cups. Highbacks rotate side to side to follow the natural contours of calves, optimizing power and comfort. 2D rookie straps with EVA padding and length adjusters feature lightweight aluminum ratchets.
short_description: The Rossingol Rookie kids' snowboard bindings transform today's groms into future shredders. You don't have to be big to go big!
